/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, and people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
